      Cookie.Definition Session.Definition.cookie() 
      Cookie.Definition Cookie.Definition.domain(String domain)
      Set the cookie's domain.
      Cookie.Definition Cookie.Definition.httpOnly(boolean httpOnly)
      Set HttpOnly flag.

      Sets the maximum age in seconds for this Cookie.

      Set/Override the cookie's name.
      Cookie.Definition Cookie.Definition.path(String path)
      Set the cookie's path.
      Cookie.Definition Cookie.Definition.secure(boolean secure)
      True, ensure that the session cookie is only transmitted via HTTPS.
      Cookie.Definition Cookie.Definition.value(String value)
      Set the cookie's value.
